alert.note: Alert for Burnet; Travis; Williamson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 6:31PM CDT until April 20 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WILLIAMSON...NORTHWESTERN TRAVIS AND CENTRAL BURNET COUNTIES... At 631 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Serenada to near Liberty Hill to near Burnet, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Round Rock, Georgetown, Burnet, Bertram, Serenada, Leander, Bartlett, Liberty Hill, Jarrell, Florence, Weir, Georgetown Dam, Watson, Joppa, Andice, Shady Grove, Oatmeal, Briggs, Sun City and Mahomet. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
